message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_DEFERTASK_ALREADY_DEFERRED
message.locale: This task has already been deferred.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_DEFERTASK_NOT_RESERVED
message.locale: This task is not reserved and therefore cannot be deferred.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_DEFERTASK_ALREADY_CLOSED
message.locale: This task has already been closed and therefore cannot be deferred.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_DEFERTASK_RESTARTDATE_LATER
message.locale: The restart date must be later than today.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_DEFERTASK_RESTARTDATE_EARLIER
message.locale: The restart date must be earlier than task deadline date.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_RESTARTTASK_NOT_DEFERRED
message.locale: This task is not deferred and may not therefore be restarted.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_RESTARTTASK_NOT_RESERVED
message.locale: This task is not reserved and therefore cannot be restarted.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASK_FORWARD_DETAILS_EMPTY
message.locale: Please choose a User, Org Unit or item to forward task(s) to.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASK_FORWARD_DETAILS_MULTIPLEVALUES
message.locale: Please choose only one User, Org Unit or item to forward task(s) to.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASK_FORWARD_DETAILS_INCOMPLETESELECTION
message.locale: Please select Forward To Type and it's value, both.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_RESERVE_DETAILS_EMPTY
message.locale: Please select a user to reserve tasks for.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_RESERVE_DETAILS_MULTIPLEVALUES
message.locale: Please select one user to reserve tasks for only.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_RESERVE_DETAILS_SENSITIVITY_MISMATCH
message.locale: This user does not have the appropriate sensitivity level to have tasks from this work queue reserved to them.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_RESERVE_TASK_ALREADY_RESERVED
message.locale: This task has already been reserved by %1s.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_RESERVE_TASK_ALREADY_CLOSED
message.locale: This task is closed and cannot be reserved.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_TASKDETAILS_RESERVE_TASK_USER_NOT_ACTIVE
message.locale: User %1s is not an active user, and tasks cannot be reserved for this user.

message.name: ERR_SUPERVISOR_TASKFILTERCRITERIA_AT_LEAST_ONE_FILTERCRITERIA_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: At least one more filter criteria must be specified.

message.name: ERR_SUPERVISOR_TASKFILTERCRITERIA_MAXTASKSSHOWN_VALUE_IS_NOT_GREATER_THAN_THOUSAND
message.locale: Specifying a value of more than %1d in Max Tasks Shown may adversely affect the performance. Please specify a value of %1d or less.

message.name: ERR_SUPERVISOR_TASKFILTERCRITERIA_CREATION_STARTDATE_MUST_BE_BEFORE_CREATION_ENDDATE
message.locale: Creation Start date must be before Creation End date.

message.name: ERR_SUPERVISOR_TASKFILTERCRITERIA_DEADLINE_STARTDATE_MUST_BE_BEFORE_DEADLINE_ENDDATE
message.locale: Deadline Start date must be before Deadline End date.

message.name: ERR_SUPERVISOR_TASKFILTERCRITERIA_SPECIFY_THE_MAX_TASKS_SHOWN_CRITERIA
message.locale: Please specify a numerical value greater than 0 for Max Tasks Shown.

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_WORKQUEUE_ASSIGNED_TASKS_EXCEEDED_MAXTASKSHOWN
message.locale: Displaying %1d of %2d tasks assigned to the work queue.

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_USER_ASSIGNED_TASKS_EXCEEDED_MAXTASKSHOWN
message.locale: Displaying %1d of %2d tasks assigned to the user.

message.name: ERR_SUPERVISOR_TASK_FORWARD_XRV_TASK_BATCH_FORWARD
message.locale: This task cannot be forwarded manually as it has already been queued for forwarding. The new task assignee(s) will be notified once the forward completes.

message.name: ERR_SUPERVISOR_TASK_REALLOCATE_XRV_TASK_BATCH_FORWARD
message.locale: This task cannot be reallocated manually as it has already been queued for forwarding. The new task assignee(s) will be notified once the forward completes.

message.name: ERR_SUPERVISOR_TASK_RESERVE_XRV_TASK_BATCH_FORWARD
message.locale: This task cannot be reserved to another user manually as it has already been queued for forwarding. The new task assignee(s) will be notified once the forward completes.

message.name: ERR_SUPERVISOR_TASK_UNRESERVE_XRV_TASK_BATCH_FORWARD
message.locale: This task cannot be unreserved from user manually as it has already been queued for forwarding. The new task assignee(s) will be notified once the forward completes.
